name: Bombasm
description:
Ready your body for Bombasm: the explosive Action-Platformer where 2-4 combatants must decimate their rival bots with bombs! Featured are futuristic dynamic stages and intuitive combat controls that push the competitive limit of easily accessible games. Skilled players must be lightning precise to control the chaos of Bombasm.

  • Juggle fate with savvy bomb handling mechanics
  • 8+ dynamic arenas in a vivid, postmodern world
  • Change the tides of battle with laser rifles, mines, missiles, and more!
  • Grab your friends and get playing within seconds! No experience needed.

DISCLAIMER: Controller highly recommended. This game requires a minimum of 2 local players.
